import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Alert from 'react-bootstrap/Alert'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; function BuyForm(props) { return (
You Pay: You Get:

{props.formData.Payment}

USD Reg USDC Avalanche Other USDC Something else
); } export default BuyForm;
